entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:11 a.m. CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
